com.epoch.session
Class PhraseTranslation

java.lang.Object
  com.epoch.session.PhraseTranslation
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppConstants, TranslationConstants
public class PhraseTranslation
extends Object
implements TranslationConstants

Stores and retrieves the translations of common ACE phrases.

Field Summary
 String[] allPhrases
          Holds all English phrases in the database; these are stored as translations that are requested by JSP pages.
 String[] translations
          Holds the phrase translations during a translation session.

Sets translations of phrases. Null values are omitted from consideration.

translate

public static String translate(String phrase,
                               String[] languages)
Gets translation of selected phrase, or returns the original (and stores it in the database) if the translation is not found.

Parameters:
phrase - a phrase to translate
languages - languages that user has chosen
Returns:
translated phrase or the original

translate

public static void translate(String[] phrases,
                             String[] languages)
Gets translations of selected phrases for display. Modifies the original, leaving in English (and storing in the database) those phrases without appropriate translations.

Parameters:
phrases - phrases to translate
languages - languages that user has chosen

Adds an English phrase to the database if it is not already in it.

Parameters:
phrase - an English phrase

Adds English phrases to the database if they are not already in it.

Parameters:

deleteEnglish

public static void deleteEnglish(String phrase)
Deletes an English phrase and all its translations from the database.
